original_text: Zedekiah was twenty-one years old when he became king, and he reigned in Jerusalem eleven years. His mother’s name was Hamutal daughter of Jeremiah; she was from Libnah.
korean_text: 시드기야가 왕이 될 때에 나이가 이십일 세라 예루살렘에서 십일 년간 다스리니라 그의 어머니의 이름은 하무달이요 립나인 예레미야의 딸이더라

sentences.original_text: Zedekiah was twenty-one years old when he became king
sentences.korean_translation: 시드기야가 왕이 되었을 때 스물한 살이었다

sentences.original_text: and he reigned in Jerusalem eleven years
His mother's name was Hamutal daughter of Jeremiah
sentences.korean_translation: 그의 어머니의 이름은 예레미야의 딸 하무탈이었다
